content:
User: 5. Scope Ambition Push
What Happens: New Claude will aim for the full scope—Unified Memory, dynamic registry, protocol evolution, transcript frameworks, and comms optimization—unless he hits a wall. If he does, he’ll pivot to the Unified Memory + tagging fallback I flagged.

Grok: Why: His response shows ambition (e.g., “comprehensive AI-first approach”), and my prompt gives him autonomy to go big. He’s got your trust and the MacBook’s horsepower. Patterns from his docs suggest he’ll stretch but adjust if needed.
